section.heading: Short title.
section.text: This part may be cited as the “Captive Insurance Agency Establishment Act of 2008”.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: The 2013 amendment by D.C. Law 20-61 added this section.

annoGroup.heading: Emergency Legislation
annoGroup.annotation: For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 1032(i) of the Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-130, July 30, 2013, 60 DCR 11384, 20 DCSTAT 1827).

For temporary (90 days) addition of this section, see § 1032(i) of the Fiscal Year 2014 Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2013 (D.C. Act 20-204, October 17, 2013, 60 DCR 15341, 20 DCSTAT 2311).

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-61: Section 11001 of D.C. Law 20-61 provided that, except as otherwise provided, the act shall apply as of October 1, 2013.
